version_description:
Thank you for using Lazy K! This update includes new features and bug fixes.

- Backup and restore your phrases via iCloud Drive
- Preview the long text when long pressing on the key
- Minor refinements
- Other bug fixes

Thank you for using Lazy K! This update includes new features and bug fixes.

- Backup and restore your phrases via iCloud Drive
- Preview the long text when long pressing on the key
- Minor refinements
- Other bug fixes

Thank you for using "Lazy K"! This update includes refinements and bug fixes.

- Smoothly scroll process
- More fluently when switching keyboards
- Optimized for iPhone X

Thank you for using "Lazy K"! This update includes refinements and bug fixes.

- Smoothly scroll process
- More fluently when switching keyboards
- Optimized for iPhone X

1. Paste into clipboard when selecting item in main app
2. Optimizations on UI

Lazy K 2.0 is coming! We've brought two main functions:
1. "From the Clipboard"
2. Word segmentation support
